sentences.en: Anita drove north up Pacific Highway.
sentences.cn: 安妮塔驱车沿太平洋公路向北行驶。

sentences.en: Chris crawled on his hands and knees out onto the highway.
sentences.cn: 克里斯手脚并用爬上了公路。

sentences.en: Do you know the highway to Tulsa? The airport road joins it.
sentences.cn: 你知道通向塔尔萨的公路吗？去机场的路和它交会。

sentences.en: Grit from the highway made him cough.
sentences.cn: 公路上扬起的沙子呛得他咳嗽起来。

sentences.en: He made a forced landing on a highway.
Highway patrol officers closed the road.
sentences.cn: 公路巡警关闭了这条路。

sentences.en: I drove back down the highway at normal speed.
sentences.cn: 我以正常车速沿公路返回。

sentences.en: In the morning I rejoined Highway 127 south.
sentences.cn: 早上我重新回到了127号公路的南端。

sentences.en: Megamalls and fast food restaurants line the highway system.
sentences.cn: 公路系统沿线有大型商场和快餐店。

sentences.en: Pictures of road signs are matched with their Highway Code meanings.
sentences.cn: 道路标志图是同公用通道法规一致的。

sentences.en: She prattled on as she drove out to the Highway.
sentences.cn: 她开车上公路时一直说个没完。

sentences.en: The highway stretched out flat and straight ahead.
sentences.cn: 公路平坦而笔直地向前延伸。

sentences.en: The regions are interconnected by an excellent highway system.
sentences.cn: 那些地区通过完善的公路系统相互连接。

sentences.en: There's nothing but woods on the other side of the highway.
Traffic was sparse on the highway.

trans.tran_en: a wide main road that joins one town to another
